LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.ModSettings.PsychicP: When enabled, psykers suffering a mental breakdown will trigger psychic phenomena.
When a psychic phenomena occur and table is rolled on a random effect is chosen, these can wary from harmless to severely destructive.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.ModSettings.PsykerPa: When enabled, children may rarely and randomly be born as psykers or pariahs.
Chance for newly born children to be psykers or pariahs: {0}%
Chance for newly born children to have a psyker or pariah gene. Parent genes have no effect on this.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.ModSettings.Perpetua: When enabled, children may rarely and randomly be born as perpetuals.
Chance for newly born children to be a perpetual: {0}%
Chance for newly born children to have a perpetual gene. Parent genes have no effect on this.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.ModSettings.DefaultC: Changes the default color of crafted armor, drop pods, NPC Astartes, Legion decorative banners, and other items related to the player's Legion or Chapter.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.ModSettings.LivingSa: Enabling this will allow colonist being killed to resurrect as Living Saints.
This is the limit of how many Living Saints may exist at any time, both living and dead.
Male colonists can become Living Saints
Only females can become Living Saints normally, this enables males to also be able to ascend.
Chances for a lost Living Saint to return in a time of threat to the colony.
Chance for Living Saints to resurrect on a big threat raid.
Chance for Living Saints to resurrect on a small threat raid.
Other modifiers may increase beyond this, such as psysensitivity traits or violence skills if enabled.
Extra chance to become living saint depending on shooting and melee skill.
For each skill point in melee and/or shooting above 10 your pawn get higher chance to become a saint.
Limit Living Saint ascension to baseliners
This limits the the Living Saint ascension system to only apply to baseliners.\nAny xenotype such as Impids will not be able to ascend.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.ModSettings.Implanta: Base implantation success chance is increased or decreased by this value.
Base implantation cap is increased or decreased by this value. Implantation cap is the maximum value of success an implantation can have.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.ModSettings.MatrixGe: Matrix gestation time factor of default: {0}%
Gestation time of all matrices are modified by this value.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.ModSettings.AllowFem: Allow vat-grown Primarchs to be female
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.ModSettings.PsychicC: Enable psychic crafting for custodes and primarch matrices
When enabled, pawns will slowly lose consciousness while creating genetic matrices.\nIf the Royalty DLC is installed and the pawn is psychic, they will lose psyfocus first.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.GeneGestator.Gestate: {0} has been gestated into {1} and can now be implanted into a suitable pawn.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.GeneGestator.SelectX: Select {0} material from among your available materials, if you have any.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.GeneGestator.EjectGe: Ejects {0} from the gene gestator, allowing you to insert another.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.GeneGestator.StartGe: Starts the gestating process, once started it cannot be stopped.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.GeneGestator.SelectM: Select matrix to gestate from among your matrices.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.GeneGestator.Missing: You have not researched any gestatable genetic matrices projects
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.GeneGestator.NoGeneM: No gene material have been selected, but you have available material.\nProceed?
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.PrimarchGrowthVat.St: Starts the primarch growth process, once started it cannot be stopped.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.PrimarchGrowthVat.Pr: Are you sure you want to start this process?\n\nOnce started, the machine cannot be stopped, and destroying it will result in the loss of the embryo.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.GeneManupulationTabl: {0} is not skilled enough to craft a primarch embryo, needs {1}
Select ascendance vial and human embryo for creation of a primarch embryo.
Cannot craft {0}, requires psychic sensitivity higher than 0%
Cannot craft {0}, requires {1} to be in linked Sangprimus
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.Containers.Sangprimu: Click for more info on this gene.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.Decorations.EditFlag: Edit the color and insignia of the banner.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.ThunderWarrior.Chanc: {0}% chance to go berserk within half a day.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.ThunderWarrior.Organ:
{0}'s {1} is unable to handle the experimental implanted extra organs!

The affected organ will slowly lose function, before dying completely.

If you want {0} to stay healthy, install a replacement {1}. This could be a bionic, or a natural organ taken from a donor.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.SpaceMarine.NoProgen: Does not have any progenoid glands
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.SpaceMarine.SMGenese: Space Marine gene-seed extraction not researched
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.SpaceMarine.PMGenese: Primaris Marine gene-seed extraction not researched
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.SpaceMarine.Progreno: {0}'s gene-seeds are ready to be harvested.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.SpaceMarine.FirstGen: Gene-seeds can be harvested in {0} days{1}.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.SpaceMarine.Geneseed: {0}% chance of successfully extracting the gene-seed.
Gene-seed extraction of {0} failed and was ruined in the process.
Gene-seed extraction of {0} succeeded and a vial was created.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.LivingSaint.LivingSa: In {0}'s final moments they felt a surge of energy coursing through them, invigorating and strengthening them. {0} was reborn as a Living Saint - stronger, faster, and more devoted than ever.
Though thought dead, {0}'s miracles keep coming. It seems {0} sensed our situation from beyond and returned to help.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.Perpetual.PerpetualR: Though thought dead, it seems {0} has regenerated even their most dire wounds.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.Ability.LorgarDivina: {0} is not part of any ideology
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.Ability.ChillgronAbi: {0} is not in mental state or have any negative thoughts or memories
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.Ability.TwinConnecte: The twin is on a different map
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.Ability.DoesNotHaveA: Does not have the Alpharius/Omegon primarch specific gene
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.Ability.DeniedWitch: {0} psychic powers have been severed (Deny the Witch)
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.Ability.PawnDoesNotH: {0} does not have the {1} gene which is required to control this mech
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.Ability.PawnCannotCo: {0} cannot control anymore {1} mechs, limit is {2}
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.Ability.WillNotSummo: Will not summon any {0} as limit has been reached
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.Ability.ProofOfFaith: Will give {1} Grace and induce {0_labelShort} with coma for {2} days.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.Ability.NoDivineGrac: {0_labelShort} does not have enough Divine Grace.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.Ability.StasisResear: {0} is about to enter stasis. You have not researched {1} and will have a hard time resurrecting {0} from stasis.\n\nUse with caution!
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.Ability.NoBleedingWo: {0} does not have any bleeding wounds.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.Ability.MustBeDowned: {0} is not downed or in bed.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.Ability.MustHaveIdeo: {0} must be part of an ideology.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.GeneseedVial.Implant: You are about to implant {0}, making them a {1}.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.GeneseedVial.Outside: {0} is outside the optimal age range of {1}~{2} for this procedure
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.GeneseedVial.Current: Current failure chance: {0}%. Failure results in death and loss of the ascendance vial. This failure chance is determined after a successful surgery.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.GeneseedVial.Failure: Procedure failure chance was capped at {0}%
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.Event.Annihilation: A psychic blast surged through {0} and into the world, causing a warp explosion completely annihilating {0} and severely damaging everything around them.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.Event.DaemonHost: A strong link was established between {0} and one of the Chaos Gods, allowing them to send in daemons.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.Event.Uncontrollable: In a temporary loss of control over their powers, {0} caused a warp explosion that damaged everyone nearby.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.Event.PsychicComa: Overwhelmed by the warp, {0} has fallen into a psychic coma.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.Event.PsychicConnect: In an instant {0} no longer felt any connection to the warp, as if completely cut off.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.Event.BloodRain: As if a cruel joke, it began raining blood.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.Event.PlantRot: All plant life seems to rot in {0}'s presence, leaving it lifeless.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.Event.NaturalBornXMe: Something felt off from the moment {1} was conceived. It has now come to light that {1} was born a {2}.
